website_summaries.verdict: These lights are a decent value pick for HomeKit households, but we prefer the features and performance of the competition.
pros: The HomeKit-compatible version of Sylvania's color-changing light strip works with Siri and it costs less than strips from Lifx and Philips Hue
cons: Sylvania's strips don't offer any unique features beyond their HomeKit compatibility, and the Bluetooth performance seemed laggier than smart lights that use Wi-Fi or Zigbee

customer_reviews.title: Remember, these are Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These lights were easy to install. The colors look great. But remember, these work via Bluetooth. If you are used to lights that work via Wi-Fi or zigbee, these Sylvania lights may seem extremely slow to you. The range and response time of Bluetooth is not great. My Sylvania lights are in the same space as my Apple TV, and I still frequently experience unresponsiveness. It’s really noticeable when I use the lights in automations. During automations, I often get errors in HomeKit because the Sylvania lights respond so slowly. If response time is important to you, definitely look at other lights that use Wi-Fi or zigbee.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up and they work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I work remotely from my home. I get interrupted while I'm on conference calls all the time from my family. So I applied these under my door and I use an Eve Button on my desk to easily turn on the lights to let everyone know I'm on a call. Problem solved. These were so easy to set up and work so well, that I'm now dreaming up other ways I can use them in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Homekit light strip
customer_reviews.text: So, the options are growing for Homekit light strips. Sylvania makes some great lighting products. Can't deny that. But these lack app support. The have the most latency of all my Homekit devices. It's frustrating when I want to change the color and it takes 30 seconds to respond. Sylvania, please update the firmware or app! Also, the power supply and control box seem a little clunky. They could have made a much smaller, usb connected power supply. I have purchased three of these and extra led strips. I trust the strip quality more than competitor offerings.
customer_reviews.author: gEoFFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: The strips will not stick to any surface, there is no hyperbole here. Whatever adhesive they are using is absolute garbage. I have tried every thing under the sun to get these strips to stay put and they simply will not. Getting in contact with their customer service is an exercise in futility because they simply do not care and will not acknowledge the issue and tried to blame me for the problem. I now have 6 feet of lighting strip with no adhesive on it that I’m going to have to figure out My own way of getting them to stay applied. Run, do not walk away from buying this product
customer_reviews.author: G. Jeff Heinzelman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this item for approximately 1 year. At first it was very simple to set up. It needed to be repaired a few times per month. It stopped connecting to homekit completely and no matter what I try it won’t connect using the numbers on the side of the device and it just stays on the entire time. For people complaining about adhesive I had the same issue and would come home to my light strips on the floor. I eventually began to use command Velcro strips (for picture frames) and it works well. I finally made the switch to Hue although their devices are expensive at least they work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Love

customer_reviews.title: Feeling frustrated...
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days I finally ran out of patience and gave up. The set I bought didn’t work right out of the box. I installed them and plugged them in and, though they did flash for a few seconds, they would go out and never come back on. I eventually able to “add accessory” in Apple HomeKit but the widget kept telling me it is not responding. I tried unplugging the lights again and plugging them back in but they still didn't work. I had high hope for the product but I think Sylvania needs to. Go back to the drawing board on these flex strip lights.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Roth

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have mentioned the adhesive strips included by Sylvania are poor at best, not that big of a deal for me as I have plenty of 3M tape to mount much heavier items. The lights themselves work great though! I have an AppleTV setup as my home hub and its in a location with minimal interference. I get maybe 1 to 2 second response times if I havn't changed the light in a while, but after that it responds immediately. Overall I'm plenty satisfied with this light, especially since its half the price of most other lights. If they would fix the adhesive issue then I would gladly give it 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: euro16v

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use with iPad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install only issue is the tape isn’t the strongest, so I used 3M two-sided tape that is a bit stronger. Otherwise they are well hidden underneath the cabinets. I got the SYLVANIA SMART+ Flex Strip Connector Kit to connect between places that didn’t need lighting. You can use Siri to activate and change colors although the color change Siri makes might not be accurate, so manual customization and saving your favorites is the way to go. There is no manual ON/OFF switch, so you need an iOS device to use the Apple Home Kit application. Love it
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, terrible adhesive.  Have a plan b
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and easy to set up. However, the adhesive is terrible. The lights fell down in less than 24 hours. In their defense, I stuck them under a riser in a home theater and they were attached to carpeting, so that was not the best contact. I want up using carpet tape to hold them in place and a day and a half later it is still holding strong... We will see how it works in the long run
customer_reviews.author: zippydog

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Setup through the APP and adding it to Homekit was a breeze. Good length too if you want to put it behind a TV or desk. I used it for back lighting behind my desk. Color adjusts easily also. I can tell you, the adhesive on this is awful. I ended up having to run 3M dual sided tape to anchor it behind my desk. Looks great too. Because of the mounting issue. I am giving this 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Walker Cooper

customer_reviews.title: For Accent Only - Not Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this light, until I tried to install it. The quality of the adhesive was so poor it didn't hold the strip to the bottom of my cabinet. To make this light usable I spent another seventeen dollars for Double Sided Tape. Although the double sided tape continues to hold after six months, it was a bad investment. The amount of light this strip produces is usable for accent only, not lighting.
customer_reviews.author: LaundryNumber 36

customer_reviews.title: Delayed Response, but a Bright Inexpensive Tape Light
customer_reviews.text: When I saw how inexpensive this light was compared to Hue’s tape lights and even their bulbs, I had to jump on buying this. It has a decent delay in response time after about 5 seconds of not triggering the light. It’s almost as if it goes into a sleep mode / low power mode. Can this be fixed with a firmware update? I don’t know. Mine is up to date. Beside that, it’s a very bright tape light for the cost. May be returning this for Hue’s tape lights. The box was also ripped inside when I opened it, assuming this was a previous return that they sold to me. Unexceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality adhesive and three LED lights malfunctioned in less than 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy to find something that didn't cost an arm and a leg and worked with HomeKit. I was wrong, I got what I paid for. The 3M adhesive double tape is poor, but I knew that from the reviews. It is probably some fake 3M tape. The worst part is the three lights malfunctioned. They don't display all the colours, and stand out, for example, if the strip is programmed to pink, those three bulbs will be in blue. I just wish I could get my money back - I spent more money on adhesive and I still can't use these. My OCD kicks in and I can't have those 3 lights in a different colour!
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Dhaka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Horrible Stick
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome. They’re a great price point for a home kit LED strip. The issue, as others have stated... they don’t stick. The 3M is AWFUL! Like lose a star awful. Sylviania must but out of their minds to think that’s acceptable. I had to use some adhesive that I already owned but I can’t believe how bad the adhesive is.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Brandy

customer_reviews.title: We also purchased the SYLVANIA Smart+ Flexible Strip Connectors kit - it had the perfect amount for wiring all the light strips back to ...
customer_reviews.text: We just installed these LED light strips under our kitchen cabinets. We purchased two kits for two separate power outlets using 5 out of the 6 included 2' strips (cutting/removing 6" off two of the 5). The pairing process to our home kit enabled iPad worked painlessly and works well for controlling all brightness & color options these light strips provide. We throughly cleaned the underside of our cabinets taking into consideration other reviews that the supplied tape does not adhere very well (time will tell). We also purchased the SYLVANIA Smart+ Flexible Strip Connectors kit - it had the perfect amount for wiring all the light strips back to my outlets. All-in-all (for now) 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: bjkqaz

customer_reviews.title: Best LED light strip product out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different products and returned them all except this one. The Sylvania product is the best. In my case, I wanted to add under-cabinet lighting: the bright white is awesome when cooking, and other colors are great for mood lighting. The only other thing you need to know, is also order double-sided tape because the adhesive that's already on the strips is very weak. The light control is with the phone app, and communicates via bluetooth. You can share the app and control with someone else if you want. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price if transformer doesn’t stop working
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great and are easy to install, use, and adjust. Colors are great and brightness is just fine for my use. The problem I have had is that the power transformer stops working. It seems to short out if it twists the wrong way. I am using them with extensions and connectors and have gone through at least three of them. On the plus side Sylvania support have been great and have given me no hassles at all about immediately shipping replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tatarelli

customer_reviews.title: very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 year old daughter as she wanted to be able to change the light color in her room. She was currently using an old set of Christmas lights (YIKES!). It took us a little bit to figure out how to pair them with her phone, mostly I believe because we didn't read the directions thoroughly. They are now up and super bright in her room! She almost doesn't even need her ceiling light anymore! We bought this set and 1 expansion pack and it wrapped around her standing floor mirror completely!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 4 Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Sylvania light steps are the most reliable HomeKit product I have in my house. I recently ordered this 4-pack to add LED lighting under my kitchen cabinets. One of the controllers does not work. This would normally be a 5-Star product, but a 25% failure rate and an estimated 3-5 day time frame to get a response from the manufacturer has left me disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not as dynamic
customer_reviews.text: Keep looking there are better options out there that adjusts smoother with more vibrance and control. Definitely lacking the amount of LEDs for the price point nor as bright or vibrant as some that cost $12 only sacrifice is HomeKit
customer_reviews.author: Max Wiederhold

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Kids Love it. I have the lights Strip lights setup on each of the bunk beds, and my 5yr son & 3 yr old daughter simply loves it. They control the light with their IPAD, and they are having blast adjusting their own light their bed via SIRI. My kids will turn the light on themselves, adjust the light percentage, which range from 1% to 100%, and various colors of their choice. It's a brilliant way to give them control of their life. I'm sure your kids will love it too, and you'll have much fun watching them in action. Highly recommend this to my friends and family. Must Buy FUN light for your kids !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great HomeKit product but very slow at switching.
customer_reviews.text: Good product - runnng three 16 foot strips with third party splitters and wiring extenders. Easy to set up with HomeKit. Strip adhered well to underside of my shelves. Adequate even light for illumination. Annoyingly slow to respond when changed - about the slowest response of anything in my HomeKit network. Sometimes takes up to 10 seconds to turn off/on/change after switched on my iphone. The rest of my HomeKit is much more responsive ( HomeKit using appletv 4K and apple airport 802.11ac, strip is 10 ft from appletv)
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these for around his TV he loves them. He did have to buy an extension kitvto get them everywhere he wanted but easy install. Lights can change colors and have sticky to the backs to apply or apply packing tape if unsure where you want them placed.
customer_reviews.author: JP Family

customer_reviews.title: Plan on replacing the adhesive before installing
customer_reviews.text: The lights integrate well with your smart home, provided you’re working with Apple’s HomeKit, anD not EcoBee, Google, etc. The only issue we’ve had (with two separate installations) is the poor quality adhesive backing. These lights won’t stick to anything for very long. The original adhesive peeled off the lights after a few weeks of use, which required us to take them back down to add a stronger adhesive tape.
customer_reviews.author: BenjColl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when on
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install, looks nice, and I really like the color options, but instructions are vague, and it took me calling the company to get it to work, a key element was left off of the instructions. Also, I have to keep integrating it with my electronic systems, it does not maintain the settings.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Well Priced.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and easy to add into HomeKit (see package insert for code). Adhesive is okay... I had to use some of my own adhesive due to the type of area I was attaching it. Unfortunately, can only choose single color mode displayed. Unable to have it fade into different colors.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not a dedicated HomeKit device
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not the same one described. Although it does work with Apple HomeKit, the link to the product description indicated a dedicated (for HomeKit) device. The light i received works with HomeKit, google home and Alexa. Which is fine, but the lights work terrible with HomeKit. This won’t stay paired, when it does work every adjustment has a 5 second delay and eventually drops.
customer_reviews.author: Rl22000

customer_reviews.title: Practical and fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s bright enough to use as a room light. The whites are pleasant to the eye and practical. The colors are rich and fun to play with. The one knock is that it is a bit slow to respond to commands, sometimes taking several seconds, when not recently controlled. However, it is ultimately reliable and does always eventually respond. Overall very good. I have two and will buy and install another.
customer_reviews.author: YF

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and i’m about to buy another one. I have a homekit home and i loved how these connect fast and the colors match up perfect with the buttons you press. i bought other ones that didn’t do any of that and this was 100% worth it to spend another $20
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Z

customer_reviews.title: Clean your surface before you install
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I’m seeing a few comments about the adhesive failing. Make sure the surface is free of dust dirt and if installing under kitchen cabinets, grease!
customer_reviews.author: Alex rau

customer_reviews.title: They work and look good behind my TV, but...
customer_reviews.text: These work well with my HomePod, but the double sided stick tape sucks. You might as well replace it with some red 3M stick tape. I wish you could bend them a little more...or add a 90 degree connection so you can go around things.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: While these had potential, the adhesive on the back of the LED tape is awful. The led tape doesn’t stay attached to the bottom of my cabinets. I also have one strand where none of the blue LEDs work, making the colors not match the rest of the strips. Overall, it’s a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Cote

customer_reviews.title: The look and work great but the tape doesn’t stick under my cabinets
customer_reviews.text: The look and work great but the tape doesn’t stick under my cabinets. I put heavy double sided tape on them and they won’t stick to the tape. I’m going to look for more options tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After a few months sections no longer hold the correct color. This has happened twice now. These were expensive in comparison and I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn't stick and the color is uneven
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality product. the adhesive doesn't stick so I had to buy double sided tape. And the color on one of the strip is different from all the others, it's pink when everything else is white...
customer_reviews.author: Raph H.

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says it will
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Siri sees it and works it with Apple Home Kit
customer_reviews.author: smartieab

customer_reviews.title: easy to connect but the adhesive sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel like paying for the Phillips overpriced so this seemed like a great alternative. So I purchased the Led strip and sure enough as everyone says here the adhesive is pretty terrible. Even following directions as far as cleaning the area the strip starting falling within an hour. I will be purchasing 3m tape to resolve the issue. Otherwise, it was easy to set up and its pretty damn bright. Having Siri turn on the lights is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio R. Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, no support, only provides frustration.
customer_reviews.text: Never works right. No manual to instruct how to reset or set up. If your Home app doesn’t see or find it be ready for hours of frustration. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mollahan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - Cannot loop colors
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed in this since it has many colors but the only way to change the color is to use your iphone. It cannot loop the colors. I was hoping to fade from green to purple for Halloween or red to green for Christmas, but it cannot do that. All the Sylvania app does is update the firmware, which I can't imagine what it is actually updating since it doesn't do much of anything in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: WKH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t connect to Apple HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pretty savvy tech guy. This product came with no HomeKit number. It wouldn’t connect via Bluetooth. I sent it back and spent the extra money on the Phillips lights....just spend the extra money to save yourself a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Davonte Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Received a discounted version, What a mistake Home couldn't read my light set. Someone had cut one of the strips and the tape looked used. Why bother!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Recessed Lighting
customer_reviews.text: We used this LED strip for recessed lighting in the kitchen. This light works as described and we are using it with Apple Home Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Chenel

customer_reviews.title: They do not stick!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights and the fact that they integrate with homekit, but my god, they don’t stick to anything! For the premium price, I shouldn’t have to re-stick my lights up every other day. I thought it was a bad batch, but I have 20 of them and they all do it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: product failed to function properly. it barely stuck to the walls and where it did it ripped paint off the drywall!on top of that, it gave no instructions on how to use it and i couldn’t connect to the device. terrible waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY GREAT PRICE. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!!! Easily set up like any other homekit product. Highly recommend this over any other strip light including philips hue strip. Cheaper and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Mandujano

customer_reviews.title: NOT as bright as hue
customer_reviews.text: Brightness is somewhere in between original hue strips and new versions. It also seems sluggish to respond after initial setup. Hoping that is some weird network issue that resolves itself. It certainly is cheaper than hue but if you want bright, this isn’t the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm revising my original review due to the phenomenal customer service from Sylvania. The intake person for efficient but courteous. When I got to the tech, he calmly walked through the details to diagnose the issue and provide an solution. It worked! I'm a little disappointed it didn't work right out of the box but its good to see the company standing behind their product with a responsive team.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stays connected and NO updating constantly like my other devices.
customer_reviews.text: This product stays connected to Homekit. Will shop for Sylvania next order. It out shines and lights any other so called smart devices I'm using by far!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great responsiveness, brightness, and color. The adhesive is crap. I had to tape them.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysVote

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t produce nearly enough brightness for under kitchen counter use
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Keeps disconnecting from my app and phone it bugs me a bit I’ve tried adding it back to home app and it never finds it
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It’s works. But!
customer_reviews.text: Lightstrip works great. The light has labeled points where you can cut the strip to fit in certain areas. I tried 2 different light strips of this type. Each time the strip was cut the whole lightstrip dies. Not recommended if you plan on cutting for size. If you plan to use the entire lightstrip as is then it should work for you
customer_reviews.author: CORREY BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Very good solution for HomeKit homes.
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the Hue catalog as these require no hub. Color matching is excellent and the price is better. Good for featured lighting projects.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Y

customer_reviews.title: You can only use done color at a time & super short
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and stuff. Just expected there to be a function where more than one color could be used at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Transmission mod is junk
customer_reviews.text: Strip throws a nice quality light but the transmission module stopped working just after the return window. I’m a HomeKit user and I would say don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: William Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and function, but plan ahead to hang them
customer_reviews.text: Great lights themselves but the adhesive is horrible. Light brightness and function is awesome and works well with HomeKit, but had to use superglue to keep them under the cabinets because they constantly fell down.
customer_reviews.author: Jim N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad slow on syncing, but otherwise works great with homekit
customer_reviews.author: Msujpn5

customer_reviews.title: The led strip light is not bright enough to meet ...
customer_reviews.text: The led strip light is not bright enough to meet my expectation as trough lighting. However, its Apple Homekit compatible let users control the color and mode of lighting handily.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes Li

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, the 3M strip is not the best but do the job. HomeKit works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Pantaleão

customer_reviews.title: No power supply unit
customer_reviews.text: The box did not come with the promised power supply unit. I am very upset I can not use these lights and have to deal with customer service now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great little lights. We used them to illuminate a disused fireplace. Instant connection to HomeKit via a HomePod. Loads of colors and brightness control.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel McInnes

customer_reviews.title: but still love this light strip
customer_reviews.text: We ended up getting different sticky tape to hold these up since the sticky back didn't do much if anything, but still love this light strip. No issues setting up, and have had zero connections issues!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Compton

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: perfect for behind the tv, under the kitchen cabinet, and everywhere. If you Wifi works well then no problems. Most of the people who complain about HomeKit have poor wifi or interference.
customer_reviews.author: jdg

customer_reviews.title: Sylvania SMART+ LED Light Strip, Apple HomeKit is Super Easy to Install and Use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and connection to HomeKit. The LEDs function beautifully with a full spectrum on color (mood) options.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dolberg

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth devices are hit and miss. Make sure it works where you want before trying to install.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two...one didn’t work at all. The other had constant updating and connection issues rendering useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Terhune

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product except for the two way tape does not take too many things
customer_reviews.author: Keith Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting,
customer_reviews.text: Works good with HomeKit. Not really as long or good as I was expecting,
customer_reviews.author: Robert Childs

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn’t stick well and power block is enormous
customer_reviews.text: These lights work well, but the adhesive strip does not stick well when hanging upside down. I cleaned the smooth wood surface before hanging but the adhesive started coming off the very next day. I have spent much time trying to install clips to keep it in place. Also, the power block is so huge it can’t be hidden and covers adjacent outlet.
customer_reviews.author: brownie ann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The strip will not hold on to any surface. Keeps on coming off from wall or TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is good, app sucks, prefer Hue and they don't play nicely with the Hue hub
customer_reviews.author: Neil Cohen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No blue color and large delays when used with HomeKit. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Vale

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these used!
customer_reviews.text: This used product was not what the box said. The LED strips were NOT Sylvania Smart LED strips. In fact, they didn’t even have male or female ends to connect them with. Clearly the previous owner took the strips out and replaced with a cheap generic strip. Sylvania’s Strips have their name printed all over them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Light Strips with HomeKit (Apple) Support
customer_reviews.text: I use HomeKit as my smart home ecosystem; I bought these strip lights because they were from a brand I was familiar with and looked pretty versatile. I bought two kits for two different shelving displays as well as the extension kits. The adhesive on them is pretty great... one strip is inverted (hung on a ceiling) and still handing over a year later with no sign of losing grip. They were easy to install via the Home app on my iPhone. They connect to one of my AppleTVs so I can easily control them from anywhere in the world as long as I have a cell or WiFi signal. These can also be automated via the Home app.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

product_meta.title: SYLVANIA General Lighting 74521 Smart LED Flex Strip, Works with Apple HomeKit and Siri Voice Control, No Hub Required, 1 Pack, Adjustable White and Full Color
product_meta.description:
Style:Flex Strip| Size:1 Pack

Connect your SYLVANIA SMART+ Bluetooth Indoor Full Color Flexible Lightstripdirectly to Apple HomeKit using Bluetooth on your compatible iOS device. Bring your smart home lighting experience to the next level by personalizing your living space with over 16 million available colors to fit your mood. With adjustable white color temperature ranging from 2700K to 6500K, you can create beautiful light scenes for parties, holidays, sporting events, and more. Take control of your lighting experience from anywhere using your iPhone or iPad by creating schedules and automations that fit into your daily routine (Home Hub set up required using HomePod, Apple TV, or iPad).

Never come home to a dark house by using your iPhone to turn your lights on when you’re coming home late or add security by keeping a well-lit house when you’re away on vacation. No hub is needed to start controlling your SYLVANIA SMART+ Bluetooth lights. Simply connect them to Apple HomeKit and begin creating your own personalized lighting experience.

What You Need to Get Started

 1. SMART+ Bluetooth Light Bulb
 2. Compatible iOS device with Apple Home app
 3. Optional: Home Hub setup for away from home control, scheduling, and automations.
feature_bullets: Apple HomeKit enabled Light: Works with Apple HomeKit to support millions of colors and adjustable white color temperature ranging from 2700K to 6500K; No hub required for set up
Voice control with Siri: Control your lights with voice integration through Siri. Ask Siri to dim your lights, set a scene, turn on or off, and more
Individual light atmosphere: LED light strip RGBW supports millions of colors and tunable white color temperature ranging from soft white to daylight (2700K to 6500K)
Energy saving bulb: Long lasting 10 watt LED (60 watt equivalent bulb) with standard A19 shape. They can be extended up to 20 feet by adding 2 feet. Extensions, sold separately

The OSRAM LIGHTIFY Gateway is not needed to use this light bulb with Apple HomeKit; Your bulb pairs directly to Apple HomeKit using Bluetooth on your compatible iOS device and is controlled through the Apple Home app
